Title: Brother's Keeper
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole"), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: As the coal mine makes one final attempt to negotiate with the Bennett clan, Loretta begins to piece together what the Bennetts did with her father.
